Brotherhood of Fyre 2.0 (Age of Sigmar) [2,000pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Order - Fyreslayers) [2,000pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Leader [120pts]

      • Auric Runesmiter [120pts]

        Selections: 2. Searing Heat, Forge Key, Fyresteel Throwing Axe, Latch-axe

        Categories: AURIC RUNESMITER, DUARDIN, HERO, PRIEST, FYRESLAYERS, ORDER, Leader

        Prayer: Searing Heat, Unit: Auric Runesmiter, Unit Abilities: Forge Key, Magmic Tunnelling, Runic Empowerment, Weapon: Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Hero), Latch-axe


        Prayer Description Ref
        Searing Heat At the start of your hero phase, 1 friendly model that knows this prayer can chant it. If they do so, make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1-2, the prayer is not answered. On a 3+ the prayer is answered. If this prayer is answered, pick an enemy unit within 18" of this PRIEST. Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that unit until the start of your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Auric Runesmiter 4"575+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Forge Key Increase range of Runic Empowerment to 18" if this model is armed with a Forge Key.
        Magmic Tunnelling Instead of setting up this model on the battlefield, you can place this model to one side and say that it is set up underground as a reserve unit. If you do so, when you would set up another friendly FYRESLAYERS unit, instead of setting up that unit on the battlefield, you can say that it is joining this model underground as a reserve unit. 1 unit can join this model in this way. At the end of your movement phase, you can set up this model anywhere on the battlefield, more than 9" from any enemy units; then set up any unit that joined this model wholly within 12" of this model and more than 9" from any enemy units. Any reserve units underground that are not set up on the battlefield before the start of the fourth battle round are destroyed.
        Runic Empowerment At the start of your hero phase, this model can chant this prayer. If they do so, make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1-2, the prayer is not answered. On a 3+ the prayer is answered. If this prayer is answered, pick a friendly FYRESLAYERS unit wholly within 12" of this model, or wholly within 18" of this model if this model is armed with a Forge Key. You can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made by that unit until the start of your next hero phase.

        Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Hero) Missile8"15+5+-1
        Latch-axe Melee1"14+3+-2

      • Hearthguard Berzerkers [240pts]

        Selections: 2x 5 Hearthguard Berzerkers [240pts], Flamestrike Poleaxe, Fyresteel Throwing Axe

        Categories: DUARDIN, HEARTHGUARD BERZERKERS, FYRESLAYERS, ORDER, Other, Battleline

        Unit: Hearthguard Berzerkers, Unit Abilities: Duty Unto Death, Karl, Smouldering Braziers, Weapon: Flamestrike Poleaxe, Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Unit)


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Hearthguard Berzerkers 4"285+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Duty Unto Death Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this unit. Add 2 to the roll if there are any friendly FYRESLAYER HEROS within 10" of this unit. On a 6+ that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Karl 1 model in this unit can be a Karl. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.
        Smouldering Braziers If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Flamestrike Poleaxe is 6, that attack inflicts 2 mortal wounds on the target in addition to any normal damage.

        Vulkite Berzerkers 4"275+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Berzerk Fury Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can choose to unleash this unit’s berserk fury. If you do so, until the end of that phase, if a model from this unit is slain, before that model is removed from play, that model can make a pile-in move and then attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with.
        Fyresteel Handaxe You can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made with a pair of Fyresteel Handaxes.
        Horn of Grimnir 1 in every 5 models in this unit can have a Horn of Grimnir. Add 1 to charge rolls for units that include any Horns of Grimnir.
        Karl 1 model in this unit can be a Karl. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.

    • Battalion [1,080pts]

      • Battalion: Lords of the Lodge [1,080pts]

        Categories: Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Oathbound Guardians

        • Auric Runefather on Magmadroth [280pts]

          Selections: 0. Tyrant Slayer, 0. Warrior Indominate, 5. Coal-heart Ancient, Blazing Maw, Claws and Horns, Fyresteel Throwing Axe, General, Latchkey Grandaxe, Roaring Fyrestream

        • Battlesmith [140pts]

          Selections: 3. The Nulsidian Icon, Ancestral Battle-axe, Fyresteel Throwing Axe

          Categories: BATTLESMITH, DUARDIN, HERO, TOTEM, FYRESLAYERS, ORDER, Leader, Artefact

          Artefact: The Nulsidian Icon, Unit: Battlesmith, Unit Abilities: Icon of Grimnir, None Shall Defile the Icon, Weapon: Ancestral Battle-axe, Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Hero)

        • Hearthguard Berzerkers [400pts]

          Selections: 4x 5 Hearthguard Berzerkers [400pts], Flamestrike Poleaxe, Fyresteel Throwing Axe

          Categories: DUARDIN, HEARTHGUARD BERZERKERS, FYRESLAYERS, ORDER, Other, Battleline

          Unit: Hearthguard Berzerkers, Unit Abilities: Duty Unto Death, Karl, Smouldering Braziers, Weapon: Flamestrike Poleaxe, Fyresteel Throwing Axe (Unit)


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        The Nulsidian Icon Each time a friendly FYRESLAYERS unit wholly within 12" of the bearer is affected by a spell or endless spell, you can roll a dice. If you do so, on a 4+ ignore the effects of that spell or endless spell on that unit.
        Tyrant Slayer Pick one of the bearer's melee weapons. You can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made with that weapon that target an enemy HERO. In addition, if the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with that weapon that targets an enemy HERO is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage.
        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Oathbound Guardians If a unit of HEARTHGUARD BERZERKERS from this battalion is wholly within 12" of a HERO from the same battalion at the start of the combat phase, then after that unit has fought in that phase for the first time, when it is your turn to pick a unit to fight with later in the same phase, it can be selected to fight for a second time.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Steadfast Advance You can use this command ability at the start of your hero phase. If you do so, pick a friendly model with this command ability. Until the start of your next hero phase, do not take battleshock tests for friendly FYRESLAYERS units while they are wholly within 18" of that model. Battletome: Fyreslayers Errata, July 2018
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Warrior Indominate Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target this general and friendly HERMDAR units wholly within 12".
        Damage Table Variable 1Variable 2Variable 3Variable 4 Ref
        Wounds0 Wounds SufferedMoveRoaring FyrestreamClaws and Horns

        Wounds2 4-610"D65
        Wounds3 7-98"2D64

        Prayer Description Ref
        Prayer of Ash At the start of your hero phase, 1 friendly model that knows this prayer can chant it. If they do so, make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1-3, the prayer is not answered. On a 4+ the prayer is answered. If this prayer is answered, pick a friendly unit wholly within 18" of this PRIEST. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until the start of your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Auric Runefather on Magmadroth *1484+
        Auric Runemaster 4"684+
        Battlesmith 4"574+
        Hearthguard Berzerkers 4"285+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Coal-heart Ancient Worsen the Rend characteristic of melee weapons that target this model by 1, to a minimum of 0.
        Duty Unto Death Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this unit. Add 2 to the roll if there are any friendly FYRESLAYER HEROS within 10" of this unit. On a 6+ that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Holy Seeker In your hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 12" of this model and roll 2 dice. If you roll at least one 6, for the rest of the battle, you can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly FYRESLAYERS units that target that unit. If you roll two or more 6s, for the rest of the battle, you can re-roll hit and wound rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly FYRESLAYERS units that target that unit instead.
        Icon of Grimnir In your hero phase, you can say that this model is raising its icon of Grimnir. If it does so, add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target friendly FYRESLAYERS units wholly within 12" of this model until the start of your next hero phase. However, if you do so, until the start of your next hero phase, friendly FYRESLAYERS units wholly within 12" of this model cannot retreat. A unit cannot benefit from this ability more than once per phase. Battletome: Fyreslayers Official Errata, May 2019
        Karl 1 model in this unit can be a Karl. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.
        Lashing Tail At the end of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of this model. If the roll is less than the number of models in that unit, it suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        None Shall Defile the Icon If this model is slain, before it is removed from play, friendly FYRESLAYERS units wholly within 12" of this model can swear to protect the fallen icon. If a unit does so, that unit cannot make normal moves and charge moves for the rest of the battle, but you can re-roll hit and wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by that unit.
        Roaring Fyrestream Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with a Roaring Fyrestream. Instead, make the dice roll shown on the damage table above. If the roll is equal to or less than the number of models in the target unit, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If the roll is equal to or less than the number of models in the target unit, and the target unit is within 6" of this model, the target unit suffers D6 mortal wounds instead.
        Smouldering Braziers If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Flamestrike Poleaxe is 6, that attack inflicts 2 mortal wounds on the target in addition to any normal damage.
        Stare Down In your hero phase, pick an enemy unit within 3" of this model. Subtract D3 from that unit’s Bravery characteristic until the start of your next hero phase.
        Volcanic Blood Roll a dice each time a wound is allocated to this model that was inflicted by a melee weapon. On a 4+ the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Volcano's Call At the start of your hero phase, this model can chant this prayer. If they do so, make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1-2, the prayer is not answered. On a 3+ the prayer is answered. If this prayer is answered, pick a terrain feature within 18" of this model. Roll a dice for each model within 1" of that terrain feature. For each roll of a 6, that model’s unit suffers 1 mortal wound. In addition, until your next hero phase, that terrain feature has the ‘Deadly’ scenery rule in addition to any other scenery rules it may have.
        Weapon-breaker At the end of the combat phase, pick an enemy HERO within 3" of this model and roll a dice. On a 6, pick one of the melee weapons that model is armed with. Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with that weapon for the rest of the battle. You cannot pick the same weapon to be affected by this ability more than once per battle.

        Ancestral Battle-axe Melee1"33+3+-12
        Blazing Maw Melee114+2+-2D3
        Brazier-staff Melee2143-1D3

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Fyreslayers

          Selections: Hermdar, Ur-Gold

          Categories: HERMDAR

          Battle Trait: Seize by Force, Ur-gold Runes, Command Abilities: Skull-breakers and Oath-takers, Ur-Gold Rune: Rune of Awakened Steel, Rune of Farsight, Rune of Fiery Determination, Rune of Fury, Rune of Relentless Zeal, Rune of Searing Heat


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Seize by Force HERMDAR units wholly within enemy territory or wholly within 12" of an objective do not take battleshock tests.
        Ur-gold Runes At the start of your hero phase, you can activate one of the following six ur-gold runes. To do so, state which rune will be activated and roll a dice. On a 1-5, the rune has the standard effect. On a 6 it also has the enhanced effect. The effect(s) of the rune lasts until the start of your next hero phase. Each ur-gold rune can only be activated once in each battle, and no more than one can be actived at the same time. Once you have used a rune, you can choose a new one to use in your next hero phase, but you cannot use the same one again.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Skull-breakers and Oath-takers You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. Pick 1 friendly HERMDAR VULKITE BERZERKERS unit or 1 friendly HERMDAR HEARTHGUARD BERZERKERS unit wholly within 12" of a HERMDAR HERO. That unit fights at the start of that combat phase, before the players pick any other units to fight with in that combat phase.
        Ur-Gold Rune EffectEnhanced Effect Ref
        Rune of Awakened Steel Improve the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly FYRESLAYERS units by 1.Improve the Rend characteristic by a further 1.
        Rune of Farsight Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with Fyresteel Throwing Axes by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with Fyresteel Throwing Axes by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Fiery Determination Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Friendly FYRESLAYERS units do not have to take battleshock tests.
        Rune of Fury You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Relentless Zeal Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly FYRESLAYERS units.Add 2 to charge rolls for friendly FYRESLAYERS units.
        Rune of Searing Heat If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made by a friendly FYRESLAYERS unit is 6, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the weapon for that attack.Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of any friendly FYRESLAYERS units when this rune is activated; on a 2+ that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

    • Malign Sorcery [40pts]

      • Magmic Invocation: Runic Fyrewall [40pts]

        Categories: MAGMIC INVOCATION, RUNIC FIREWALL, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Runic Fyrewall, Unit Abilities: Awakened Runes, Impervious to Heat, Roaring Rune-fire


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Runic Fyrewall 3+At the start of your hero phase, 1 friendly FYRESLAYERS PRIEST can attempt to perform this magmic invocation. If they do so, make an invocation roll by rolling a dice. On a 3+ the invocation roll is successful. If the invocation roll is successful, set up this model wholly within 18" of that FYRESLAYERS PRIEST.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Awakened Runes Re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target FYRESLAYERS units wholly within 12" of this model.
        Impervious to Heat MAGMADROTHS can pass across this model in the same manner as a model that can fly.
        Roaring Rune-fire A model cannot see another model if an imaginary straight line, 1mm wide, drawn from the centre of its base to the centre of the other model’s base passes within 1" of this model.

    • Scenery

      • Magmic Battleforge

        Categories: FYRESLAYERS, MAGMIC BATTLEFORGE, SCENERY

        Unit Abilities: Molten Blessing, Spending the Forge


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Molten Blessing At the start of your hero phase, 1 friendly FYRESLAYERS PRIEST within 6" of a Magmic Battleforge can control its magmic energies. If they do so, until the end of that phase, add 1 to prayer rolls for friendly FYRESLAYERS PRIESTS while they are within 18" of that Magmic Battleforge. You cannot use the Molten Blessing ability and the Spending the Forge ability for the same Magmic Battleforge in the same phase. Battletome: Fyreslayers Official Errata, May 2019
        Spending the Forge Once per battle, at the start of your hero phase, 1 friendly FYRESLAYERS PRIEST within 6" of a Magmic Battleforge can spend all of the forge’s energy instead of using its Molten Blessing ability. If they do so, until the start of your next hero phase, you can re-roll save rolls of 1 for friendly FYRESLAYERS units on the battlefield. However, for the rest of the battle, FYRESLAYERS PRIESTS can no longer use this Magmic Battleforge’s Molten Blessing ability.

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6. (Core Rules p3)

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll. (Core Rules p3)

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase. (Core Rules p3)
